mapinfo.detailsText:
Players joined the Seminole natives in this swampy and mysterious place. Resources seem plentiful but you need to make your way through the hostile swamp in the north to access further silver and food sources. It is said that merchants dare to venture through a trade route in the middle of this region.
 
 Native Civs: Seminoles 
 Mercenaries: Renegado / Pistolero 
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_heavy_infantry)> <u>Player Setup in Observer Mode</u>
 -1v1: FFA
 -2v2: 1+2 vs 3+4
 -3v3: 1+2+3 vs 4+5+6
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_ceasefire)> <u>Observer Setup</u>
 -Team does not matter
 -Don't use Iroquois / Aztec / Sioux!
 
 Designed by Rikikipu 
 Observer UI by Aizamk
mapinfo.loadDetailsTexT:
Players joined the Seminole natives in this swampy and mysterious place. Resources seem plentiful but you need to make your way through the hostile swamp in the north to access further silver and food sources. It is said that merchants dare to venture through a trade route in the middle of this region.
 
 
--------------------------------- 
 
 -NativeCiv: Seminoles 
 -Outlaws: Renegado / Pistolero
